metadata.title: Arctic (Amundsen Gulf) dissolved carbon data, 1990-2000
metadata.description: Opportunistic samples from the Amundson Gulf area. Good quality data, few samples.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Time series database of carbon cycle in arctic.

Supplemental Information: Risk Justification: Data not secured in regional data centre.
Risk of Loss: Medium
Impact Justification: Data are related to a subject, location or species of concern within the scientific,  government or public community within the last 5 years.
Impact of Loss: Medium
Recommended Action: Bring data to archives when proprietary period is finished.

Status: In work
